name: Blitz Freak
description: Blitz Freak is an online multiplayer VR game optimized for e-Sports. Players can fly through the air with locomotion completely free of VR motion sickness, and knock out opponents with intuitive controls.
minimum_requirements: OS: win 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1060 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: win 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1070 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
